CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Previous_Animal_Action__c ), " ", "Previous Vaccine on " & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Previous_Animal_Action__r.Date_Time_of_Action__c))) &"/"& TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Previous_Animal_Action__r.Date_Time_of_Action__c)))&"/"& TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Previous_Animal_Action__r.Date_Time_of_Action__c))) & " For " & Previous_Animal_Action__r.Description__c)
CustomField.label: Previous Action Detail
